sn55.19:1.2: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—jetavane antarahito devesu tavatimsesu paturahosi.
sn55.19:1.3: Atha kho sambahula tavatimsakayika devatayo yenayasma mahamoggallano tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahamoggallanam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho ta devatayo ayasma mahamoggallano etadavoca:
sn55.19:2.1: “Sadhu kho, avuso, buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanam hoti—
sn55.19:2.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.19:2.3: Buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanahetu kho, avuso, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna.
sn55.19:2.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanam hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.19:2.7: Ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanahetu kho, avuso, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna”ti.
sn55.19:3.1: “Sadhu kho, marisa moggallana, buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanam hoti—
sn55.19:3.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.19:3.3: Buddhe aveccappasadena samannagamanahetu kho, marisa moggallana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna.
sn55.19:3.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanam hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.19:3.7: Ariyakantehi silehi samannagamanahetu kho, marisa moggallana, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna”ti.
